name: bakery-inventory-management
description: A comprehensive inventory management system for bakery and chocolate businesses

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev

author: Oscar
